definition: to split/to crack/to break open/to rend
to arrange/to line up/file/series/(in data tables) column/(Tw) row
to split up/to divide/to break up/fission/schism
to rupture/to fracture/to break down/(linguistics) plosion
to split open/to dehisce (of fruit or cotton bolls, to split open)
to cut apart/to sever/to separate/to isolate
to rupture/to burst open/to break/to break off relations with/a rupture

sentences.english: One of our windowpanes is cracked .
sentences.chinese: 我们的窗玻璃裂了一块。

sentences.english: The strain-fatigue-life of materials is related to the plastic strain at the crack-tip.
sentences.chinese: 材料的应变疲劳寿命与裂端的塑性应变有关。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of iliac crest bone graft in reconstruction of alveolar bone cleft.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨应用髂骨移植在齿槽裂修复中的价值。

sentences.english: The low density areas occurred in the temporoparietal lobe near sylvian fissure in middle cerebral artery territory.
sentences.chinese: 大脑中动脉支配区外侧裂附近颞顶叶梗塞。

sentences.english: The slits which have been created parametrically open the enclosure of the reinforced concrete wall.
sentences.chinese: 已创建的参数化打开的外壳裂钢筋混凝土墙。

sentences.english: The bag was so full that it burst open.
Valves 1 or 2 or all with tubercles, margin denticulate .
sentences.chinese: 裂爿1或2或全部具小瘤，边缘具小齿。

sentences.english: The pipe burst, and the water squirted out.
Bill's rod is splintered and Mark's reel out of fix.
sentences.chinese: 比尔的钓竿已经裂了，马克的绕线轮也坏了。

sentences.english: He holds out an arm so she can see the gaping sleeve.
sentences.chinese: 他伸出一只胳膊这样她就能够看见裂了口的袖子。

sentences.english: For your footings to prevent frost heave.
sentences.chinese: 您的立足处要保证防止冰冻胀裂。

sentences.english: Heart, the struggle to tear Qin crack lung pain.
sentences.chinese: 心，纠缠着撕吢裂肺的疼。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the MRI characteristics of choroid fissure cysts of the brain.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脑部脉络膜裂囊肿的MRI表现特点。

sentences.english: Naga live near the south end, in the Riplash Ruins.
sentences.chinese: 纳迦在南端的裂鞭废墟生活。

to disintegrate/to shatter into small pieces
